title: Shuumatsu no Nosferatu
original_name: 終末のノスフェラトゥ
sinopse:
There was once a group of immortals who spread disaster across the world, but then suddenly disappeared from history. After a hundred years, a woman suddenly awakens from being buried in a forest, and she has no memories. She is immediately attacked by a vampire who wants to drink her blood.

(Source: MU)
